ainmear_fireann.note: From Scottish Natural Heritage's Faclan Nàdair.
Synonyms: ròn liath m, ròn mòr m
Plurals: ròin ghlasa, ròin liath, ròin mhòra
Info: Gaelic saying ' Is toigh leinn an ròn ach cha toigh leinn naidheachd an ròin' - we like the seal but not the seal's news which is bad weather is at hand.
